channel.title: Change prices of items?
channel.description:
how do i change the price of items
its nto in shops.cfg or item.cfg
i checked some one help :)

item.title: Change prices of items?
item.dc:creator: @joeyjoe9876 joeyjoe9876
item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

[quote=“gonja, post:7, topic:252667”][quote author=joeyjoe9876 link=topic=333757.msg2600185#msg2600185 date=1230181011]

its usually the first one
exe:

itemid = 1234   random_text_of_randomness    shopprc    highalc    lowalc     stabdef     slashdef    crushdef    magicdef   rangedef     stabatk    slashatk    crushatk    rangeatk    magicatk    str    prayer

correct me if im wrong, cuz i typed out on my wii, but thats the gist of it.

lolz i got grounded so i had to type on my wii, i had to type this on my wii - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,332662.0.html
[/quote]

lols, u used key board or remote like me?[/quote] the freaking REMOTE!!!

item.title: Change prices of items?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The first 3 numbers are the shop price, low alch, and high alch. Although I don’t think that’s the order; but that is the first 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Change prices of items?

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

search button. Item.cfg for prices. you’re going to have to figure out which of the 13 possible places are the prices though.
